name: Rebirth in the end times: I reached the top by opening boxes
author: A bit of pen studio
content: Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. From then on, he embarked on the road to the king&#039s counterattack.
